description: Returns a list of dataset export jobs that use the given dataset. When a dataset is not specified, all the dataset export jobs associated with the account are listed. The response provides the properties for each dataset export job, including the Amazon Resource Name (ARN). For more information on dataset export jobs, see CreateDatasetExportJob. For more information on datasets, see CreateDataset.

nested_items.name: datasetExportJobs
nested_items.description: The list of dataset export jobs.

nested_items.name: datasetExportJobArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the dataset export job.

nested_items.name: jobName
nested_items.description: The name of the dataset export job.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the dataset export job.
CREATE PENDING > CREATE IN_PROGRESS > ACTIVE -or- CREATE FAILED.

nested_items.name: creationDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time (in Unix time) that the dataset export job was created.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time (in Unix time) that the dataset export job status was last updated.

nested_items.name: failureReason
nested_items.description: If a dataset export job fails, the reason behind the failure.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: A token for getting the next set of dataset export jobs (if they exist).
